CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 20, 1945, pg. 13 reads: "Giving With A Smile - Emphasizing the needs and benefits of the United War-Community Fund Drive, students of A. Leo Weil School are rehearsing the above titled playlet under the direction of Miss Betty Alport. Students from the primary grades of the school are being presented in a series of skits and singing Friday morning, Oct. 19. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Four boys and three girls, most wearing large feathers on chest, posed on stage in A. Leo Weil School with sofa covered in plaid blanket, for playlet "Giving With A Smile," another version
